availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Daniel W. Lovell (Laurel County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Laurel County, Kentucky, farmer. North Carolina native. Married to Nancy Lovell. Father of Mary J. Lovell, Sara Ann Lovell, James Lovell, and Skinner M Lovell. Farmer in Laurel County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Laurel County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Laurel County, p. 2B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Laurel County, p. 0.
Find A Grave, "Daniel Webster Lovill (1822-1889)," Memorial #74289707, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/74289707 (accessed June 22, 2017).
